job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Do you have an interest in sports betting? This is the role for you. This company is a sports betting exchange that prides themselves on bringing innovation, transparency, liquidity, and security to the sports betting industry to benefit their customers.<br><br>Right now, they are looking for an experienced Site Reliability Engineer to join their operations and infrastructure team. This is a combination of DevOps, cloud engineering, and system operations. You should be someone who is experienced in AWS, programming and/or scripting in Python or Bash, infrastructure as code, Docker and Kubernetes, and monitoring.<br><br>This is a full-time, fully remote role offering up to $150k with great benefits like unlimited PTO.<br><br><strong><u>Required Skills &amp; Experience<br></u></strong><ul><li>3+ years of experience in DevOps, SRE, or software engineering</li><li>AWS</li><li>Infrastructure as Code (Terraform preferred)</li><li>Kubernetes &amp; Docker</li><li>Scripting an/or programming experience (Python preferred)<br></li></ul><strong><u>What You Will Be Doing<br></u></strong><ul><li>Work closely with development teams and stakeholders to effectively deliver software with a focus on automation and security </li><li>Manage and create cloud infrastructure</li><li>Assist in automating release and development processes</li><li>Set up and maintain tools such as Grafana, Jenkins, and Prometheus</li><li>Work with development teams to create safe and healthy code</li></ul> <strong>The Offer:<br></strong><ul><li>Competitive Salary: Will pay up to $150k based on experience<br></li></ul><strong><u>You Will Receive The Following Benefits<br></u></strong><ul><li>Competitive Medical, Dental, and Vision benefits with 100% employee medical premium contribution </li><li>Unlimited PTO </li><li>Remote schedule</li><li>Work with innovative technology <br></li></ul>Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis now and in the future.<br><br><strong>Posted By:</strong> Alyssa Valles
